I love to curl up with a good book and lose myself in another world.
i love to ski in the winter.
I want a home with a secure bike parking space and a place to plug in my tablet.

participant_2.background:
I am looking for a new home that is pet-friendly and close to my work.
I'm a vet student, so I can help animals and use my math and science skills in a career that I love.
i am witty.
I'm going to spend time with my family and friends.
I start my day with a healthy breakfast of organic granola and fruit.

content.text: I love to curl up with a good book and lose myself in another world. What is your favorite book?
I am currently reading a book called "The Alchemist", it's a great book that teaches you about the power of dreams and following your heart.
I've heard great things about that book, I might have to check it out. I love to read mystery books, I just finished reading "The Girl on the Train" and it was so good!
I'm not usually into mystery books, but I might have to check that one out too. I love to read books about animals, especially horses.
I love animals too, I have a dog named Charlie and he's the best friend I could ask for.
Aww, I love dogs! I have a cat named Mittens and she's the sweetest thing ever.
I love to ski in the winter, what do you like to do in the winter?
I love to go snowboarding! It's so much fun to fly down the mountain and feel the wind in your hair.
That sounds like a lot of fun, I've never been snowboarding before. Maybe we could go sometime and you can teach me!
I would love to teach you how to snowboard! We could go to a nearby mountain and have a lot of fun.
That sounds like a great idea! I'll have to get my ski gear out and ready.
Me too! I can't wait to go snowboarding with you.
